=== Hardware Specification ===
* Make: MSI
* Brand: MegaBook
* Model: S262R-292FI
* Website: http://global.msi.com.tw/index.php?func=proddesc&prod_no=658&maincat_no=135&cat2_no=270

=== Hardware Details ===
* Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T7200 2.0G
* Memory: 1024Mb DDRII
* Video: Intel® GMA950 (UMA)
* Screen: 12.1" 1280x800
* Hard Disk: 120Gb 5400rpm SATA
* Optical: 8x DVD-Super Multi
* WLan: Intel 3945ABG 802.11a/g/b
* Lan: 10/100/1000 GbLAN (Realtek 8168?)
* Mouse: Touchpad
* Keyboard: FI
* 56k Modem
* Bluetooth: Bluetooth® V2.0+ EDR
* Card Reader: 3-in-1 MMC / SD / MS

=== Current Issues ===
No known issues. One of the most Linux-compatible laptops I've seen.
